keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Falih Hassan and Omar Al-Jawoshy contributed reporting from Baghdad, and an employee of The New York Times from Anbar Province.

lead_paragraph: Civilians have been trapped in Falluja, where the Islamic State is under siege, and Shiite militias have stoked tensions elsewhere in Anbar Province.

headline.print_headline: Iraq Battle Gains but No Stability
headline.main: In Effort to Defeat ISIS, U.S. and Iran Impede One Another

snippet: Civilians have been trapped in Falluja, where the Islamic State is under siege, and Shiite militias have stoked tensions elsewhere in Anbar Province.
abstract: Iraqi forces supported by American military have taken back some significant areas in Iraq that were once held by Islamic State, but despite gains, fail to create economic and social stability in newly freed territory.
